arts.ttl: Silva admits Fulham were ‘flat’ in defeat at Arsenal
arts.sum: Marco Silva admitted Fulham were “flat” in their 2-1 defeat against Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium. Goals from Mikel Merino and the Ealing-born Bukayo Saka,. who scored on his return from injury, saw off the Whites, who, despite a late consolation goal from Rodrigo Muniz, rarely threatened.
